children.value:
I'm excited to announce that the game I've been working as a programmer on has reached it's fundraising goal on IndieGoGo.
For the demo, we used an asset in Unity called AdventureCreator which is especially awesome for point-and-click adventure games.
To learn more about the campaign and to download the demo click here.
You can also stay up to date on our social media page.
